name: Sameer Rastogi
position: Managing Partner, India Juris  |  Vice-President, AEA-International Lawyers Network |

current_company.name: INDIA JURIS
current_company.title: Managing Partner, India Juris  |  Vice-President, AEA-International Lawyers Network |

positions.subtitle: INDIA JURIS
positions.description: INDIA JURIS is a Full Service International Law Firm with offices at New Delhi, Mumbai, Gurugram, Bengaluru and GIFT City, Gujarat with expertise in Business, Corporate, Litigation, Arbitration and Intellectual Property Laws. The firm deals in most of the business sectors with global clients. With around 350 start-up investment transactions annually and having tier 1 leading investors as clients, India Juris leads the domain in India. The firm is extensively advising accelerators, incubators, angel networks, AIFs, angel funds, start-ups and entrepreneurs. Now India Juris is also assisting start-ups in setting up holding structure in USA and raising Series A onwards funds from US and Global investors .
positions.title: Managing Partner
positions.description_html:
INDIA JURIS is a Full Service International Law Firm with offices at New Delhi, Mumbai, Gurugram, Bengaluru and GIFT City, Gujarat with expertise in Business, Corporate, Litigation, Arbitration and Intellectual Property Laws. The firm deals in most of the business sectors with global clients.

With around 350 start-up investment transactions annually and having tier 1 leading investors as clients, India Juris leads the domain in India. The firm is extensively advising accelerators, incubators, angel networks, AIFs, angel funds, start-ups and entrepreneurs. Now India Juris is also assisting start-ups in setting up holding structure in USA and raising Series A onwards funds from US and Global investors .

positions.subtitle: India Juris Education Foundation
positions.description: Sameer Rastogi also holds position of Chairman of India Juris Education Foundation, a Non-Profit Organisation with the objective of "Education for all".  A charitable and noble venture supported by the firm India Juris.
